GGIR operates as open-source software, offering opportunities for contribution 
to its development. Delve into this article to gain a deeper understanding of 
how you can actively participate and contribute to the advancement of GGIR.

## Contributing to the code

The development version of GGIR can be found on
[github](https://github.com/wadpac/GGIR), which is also where you will
find
[guidance](https://github.com/wadpac/GGIR/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md)
on how to contribute.
